title: Baked samosas
description: Baked samosas are a healthier alternative to the fried versions you find in most Indian takeaways - Manju Mahli’s spicy vegetarian version makes a stunning starter or snack.Each serving provides 133kcal, 4g protein, 21g carbohydrate (of which 2g sugars), 3g fat (of which 0.5g saturates), 4g fibre and 0.4g salt.
ingredients: 300g/11oz wholemeal flour, plus a little extra for the ‘glue-like paste’ and a little extra for flouring
tomato chutney or ketchup, to serve
